title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein (2001) Rip [AVeRAnTeD]
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Return to Castle Wolfenstein (2001) Rip
!! Ripped By AVeRAnTeD !!

World War II rages and nations fall. SS head Himmler has Hitler's full backing to

and for all. Battling alone, you're on an intense mission to pierce the black heart
of the Third Reich and stop Himmler -- or die trying.
